Literature.Title: Structure-activity study of macropin, a novel antimicrobial peptide from the venom of solitary bee Macropis fulvipes (Hymenoptera: Melittidae).
Literature.Author: Monincová L, Veverka V, Slaninová J, Budesínský M, Fucík V, Bednárová L, Straka J, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=1.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=10.0µM),Escherichia coli B(MIC=2.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=10.0µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=5.0µM)
